user-story.as-a: viewer or maker who has lost access
user-story.i-want: to recover my account using a secure email workflow
user-story.so-that: I can regain access without contacting support.

acceptance-criteria.criterion: Recovery flow issues a one-time recovery token that expires in 15 minutes and can only be used once.
Recovery emails include device + location metadata and a “Not You?” link that revokes the token immediately.
Submitting a recovery token allows the user to re-authenticate and forces a passwordless login plus full session rotation.
Attempting to reuse or brute force recovery tokens locks the account for 30 minutes and alerts security monitoring.
Successful recovery must invalidate all active sessions and refresh tokens associated with the account.
